The entire cave was a new world for Nightshift as he explores further into =
its natural wonders, while also looking for the Protohumans.  The sound of =
trickling water now gets his attention as he comes to an underground pool o=
f fresh water, clear as crystal.  He could see the bottom of the pool clear=
 as day, and the slight illumination it was giving off.

" Whoa, check this=
 out.  So much ta see, even in here.  Ya know, if those Protohumans are liv=
ing here, I bet they know how ta take care of the environment around them. =
 I mean, if they were all that bad, none of this would be untouched like it=
 is now.  I dunno if I'm right but, without the Protohumans, there wouldn't=
 be an ecosystem."

He then stops, and spots a Protohuman fishing in a far =
part of the pool.

" Psst, over there, there's one now.  Looks like he's ga=
thering food.  Hmm, I wonder how these fishies taste...  If they eat them, =
then they gotta be good."

He puts his paw into the water to snatch a minno=
w but comes up with a crayfish pinching his left paw.

" Ow, ow, owwww.... =
 What the scrap?"

He shakes it back into the pool.

" Didn't see that Comm=
'n.   Sorry, my bad.  Okay this time I am gonna 
catch a fish."

He quietly=
 puts his paw in the water and this time he scores himself a fish.  He snif=
fs it and then gathers it into his jaws, munching it like a true feline.

"=
 Mmm, not bad.  I can see why they fish for these.   They taste good and th=
ere's lots of them." 

He then remains still to watch the Protohuman fishin=
g.  

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and d=
igital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occa=
sion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at=
 this address and we will talk.
